p: When looking through articles from non-scientific journals, we also found some specific management measures, especially eradication measures. An experiment was performed in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany in which Phytolacca americana was impregnated in order to prevent its natural rejuvenation sprouting. In order to be able to contain P. americana with an economical use of labour and costs, measures must be taken before seed banks are established. The most successful measure was the digging up of the entire plant prior to seed collection ( Rupp et al., 2017).
